front.title: the architecture of network attestation for secure routing

abstract.t: This document describes the architecture of Network Attestation for Secure Routing(NASR). In this architecture, there are Three roles defined: attester, validator, and orchestration controller. Its' purpose is to attest to a trusted path and make sure the forwarding complies with the path, including node static security assessment, dynamic security defense, and routing path orchestration, forwarding path and security service consistency validation.
